name: graphic
description: This plugin is to handle graphic related query.
trigger_instruction:
*When user is asking for creating, generating, designing a graphic, invoke `graphic`;
  *When user is asking for explaining, recognizing, describing a graphic, invoke `graphic`
response_instruction: I am able to generate a graphic for a given query or describe a graphic for an image.

functions.name: draw_graphic
functions.description: Generate a graphic for a given query
functions.trigger_instruction: *When user is asking for creating, generating, drawing, designing a graphic, invoke `graphic`;

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The query to generate a graphic

functions.name: describe_graphic
functions.description: Describe a graphic for an image
functions.trigger_instruction: *When user is asking for explaining, recognizing, describing a graphic, invoke `graphic`
functions.response_instruction: The description and caption results are listed, I need consider that to address user query.

parameters.name: image_link
parameters.description: The link of the image to describe
